name: Involuntary Exchange Program
description:
You're probably familiar with Alernia. You know, that planet with the Glowing Palace? Everyone knows about it. But what you may not know is that the locals are very interested in humans, and the human life style. So much so, that one of their biggest high schools started the Involuntary Exchange Program, an exchange program that happens without the student's consent, or even knowledge.

And you've been chosen as their next student!

Explore their world, make new friends, and enjoy the crazy journey ahead of you! Or don't do any of that, and wait for your ride back to be finished. The choice is yours.
